home.intro:
Welcome! This is my first ever personal website!
I'm on the path of being a biotechnology engineer.

phd.title: Doctor of Philosophy
phd.place: Rice University, George R. Brown School of Engineering, Houston, Texas, USA

ms.title: Master of Science
ms.place: Rice University, George R. Brown School of Engineering, Houston, Texas, USA
ms.award1: Trainee Highlight Award: The 7th Annual BRAIN Initiative Investigators Meeting. $400 stipend.
ms.course: Machine Learning and Signal Processing for Neuro Engineering, Computer Vision, Synthetic Biology, Deep Learning, Optical Imaging and Nanobiophotonics, Network Science and Analytics, etc.

bs2.title: Bachelor of Science in Engineering
bs2.place: University of Michigan, College of Engineering, Ann Arbor, Michigan, USA
bs2.award2: James B. Angell Scholar: Mar. 2016. Awarded to students with four or more consecutive terms of all A's.
bs2.award3: University Honors (4x) and Dean's Honor List (4x): Fall 2014, Winter 2015, Fall 2015, and Winter 2016. Awarded to students with CGPA > 3.5.
bs2.course: Biochemistry, Biomechanics, Quant. Physiology, Quant. Cell Biology, Optoelectronics, Semiconductor Devices, etc.

bs1.title: Bachelor of Science in Engineering
bs1.place: Shanghai Jiao Tong University, UM-SJTU Joint Institute
bs1.award1: Excellent Student Scholarship (Level C) (2x): Academic year 2012-2013 and 2013-2014. ￥500 stipend.
bs1.award2: Dean's List (3x): Fall 2012, Summer 2013, and Fall 2013. Awarded to students with term GPA > 3.5.
bs1.course: Signals and Systems, Logic Design, Engineering Materials, Modern Physics, Data Mining, etc.

high.title: High School

high.award1: Shanghai Future Science Star: 1 of 10 awardees. ￥10,000 scholarship.
high.award2: First Prize in The 26th Intel Shanghai Adolescents Science & Technology Innovation Fair
high.award4: Vice Chief of Student Association Communication Department (2010 - 2011)
